meta.description: Determine the number of cars and buses to transport employees while minimizing pollution.

sets.name: TRANSPORT_MODES
sets.description: Types of transport available for employees.

params.name: capacity
params.description: Capacity of each transport mode in terms of number of employees.

params.name: pollution
params.description: Pollution produced by each transport mode.

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of each type of transport used.

objective.name: min_total_pollution
objective.expr: sum(pollution[t] * x[t] for t in TRANSPORT_MODES)
objective.description: Minimize the total pollution produced by the transport modes.

constraints.name: employee_transport_requirement
constraints.expr_lhs: sum(capacity[t] * x[t] for t in TRANSPORT_MODES)
constraints.description: At least 300 employees need to be transported.

constraints.name: bus_limit
constraints.description: At most 4 buses can be used.
